long_description: Send boys off on the Electra RatRod 1 20 in. bike and soon they'll be cruising down the road with the wind in their hair. Thanks to the cool flame graphics, they'll look as stylish as they feel. With a single speed and coaster brakes, the kids-size RatRod is simplicity itself; there are no shifters or hand brakes to concern a new rider. Flame graphics on the black frame, fenders and chainguard suit a young man's sensibilities; he'll love the look of the spring-cushioned saddle as well. Custom red rims set the look off nicely. Integrated coaster brake is both effective and intuitively simple to use-just have him pedal in reverse. Sturdy steel frame withstands all sorts of abuse; metal chain cover and fenders help protect child from grime and moving parts. Flat Foot Technology lets a child to rest both feet on the ground while seated on the saddle. Ergonomic saddle helps balance the child atop the bike in comfort; handlebar design accommodates an upright ride and enhances control. Wide balloon tires enhance stability and traction. Specs are subject to change.
short_description: Send boys off on the Electra RatRod 1 20 in. bike and soon they'll be cruising down the road with the wind in their hair. Thanks to the cool flame graphics, they'll look as stylish as they feel.
